feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-07-24T13:58:24.769645Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;Driver.js：产品介绍、亮点、上下文帮助等</stitle>; <id>;https://driverjs.com/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-24T12:54:30.649 235Z</updated>; <link href="https://driverjs.com/"/>; <author>; <name>;thunderbong</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thunderbong</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://driverjs.com/driver.svg" style="width: 220px; height: 324px;" />;<br />;由于其广泛的 API，driver.js 可用于广泛的用例。通过突出显示功能，您可以消除干扰并将用户的注意力集中在重要的事情上。为您的用户提供上下文帮助，解释如何使用您的产品并回答常见问题。突出显示新功能，解释如何使用它们并确保您的用户不会错过它们。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#driver-js-product-tours-highlights-contextual-help-and-more" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36846520" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;更改 Android 强制门户页面（2020）</stitle>; <id>;https://www.encrypted.at/android-captive-portal/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T12:54:30.660188Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.encrypted.at/android-captive-portal/"/>; <author>; <name>;transp ute</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=transpute</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.encrypted.at/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/android-debugging.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 126px;" />;<br />;如果您不希望 Android 手机在切换网络时始终联系 Google 服务器，您可以自行托管强制门户页面。为此，您需要一个 Web 服务器并能够返回“204 无内容”HTTP 状态代码。您可以通过打开手机的 shell/终端连接并使用适当的命令来更改 URL。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#chang-the-android-captive-portal-page-2020" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36846567" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;让谈话脱离困境的“三件事”练习（2011）</stitle>; <id>;https://math.stanford.edu/~vakil/thirdthings.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T02:54:30.662685Z</updated>; <link href="https://math.stanford.edu/~vakil/thirdthings.html"/>; <author>; <name>;mutant_glofish</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mutant_glofish</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;“三件事”练习是一种从演讲中提取有价值信息的方法。目标是将演讲中的三个关键要点写在一张纸或索引卡上。这些要点可以是定理、激发问题、问题或演讲中突出的任何其他内容。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the- Three-things-exercise-for-getting-things-out-of-talks-2011" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36842239" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Debian riscv64</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.aurel32.net/welcome-debian-riscv64.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-24T01:54:30.663897Z</更新>; <link href="https://blog.aurel32.net/welcome-debian-ris cv64.html"/>; <author>; <name>;pabs3</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pabs3</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;经过多年的努力，Debian riscv64现已成为官方架构。该端口需要重新启动、修复错误并重新安装构建守护程序，然后才能发布。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#debian-riscv64" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36841798" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text ">;C89 编译器从 C 代码生成可打印的可执行文件 [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;http://www.cs.cmu.edu/~tom7/abc/paper.pdf</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T07:54:30.665274Z</updated>; <link href="http://www.cs.cmu.edu/~tom7/abc/paper.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;CharlesW</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=CharlesW</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;G3"1pfu nuaj x4(plxd$@$ 49p%@ g!e xg1e "j"x4"ph dxd4,,zp% @!. '' - a j-x4, bj, cy & z-z',/() <a href="https://hackernews.betacat. io/#c89-compiler- Produces-printable-executables-from-c-code-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36821985" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题type="text">;Unicode 字符“𝕏” (U+1D54F)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.compart.com/en/unicode/U+1D54F</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T11:54:30.666676Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.compart.com/en/unicode/U+1D54F"/>; <author>; <name>;t0m 44c</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=t0m44c</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;U+1D54F 是字符 Mathematical Double-Struck Capital X 的 unicode 十六进制值。Char U+1D54F，编码，HTML 实体：𝕏、𝕏、𝕏、UTF-8（十六进制） 、UTF-16（十六进制）、UTF-32（十六进制）<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#unicode-character-u-1d54f" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36846076" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Twitter 已正式将其徽标更改为“X”</stitle>; <id>;https://techcrunch.com/2023/07/24/twitter-has-officially-changed-its-logo-to-x/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T09:54:30.669459Z</updated>; <link href="https://techcrunch.com/2023/07/24/twitter-has-officially-changed-its-logo-to-x/"/>; <作者>; <name>;pallas_athena</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pallas_athena</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://techcrunch.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/ 07/x-twitter.jpg?w=730" style="width: 220px; height: 101px;" />;<br />;Twitter 已正式将其徽标更改为“X”。Twitter 首席执行官埃隆·马斯克宣布了徽标更改，并暗示 Twitter 品牌将进一步发生变化。马斯克对字母“X”的痴迷是众所周知的，因为他创立了多家名称中带有“X”的公司。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#twitter-has-officially-changed-its-logo-to-x" target=" _blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36845111" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：我的钢笔绘图之旅</stitle>; <id>;https://adamfuhrer.com /pen-plotting-experiments</id>; <更新>;2023-07-24T02:54:30.671013Z</更新>; <link href="https://adamfuhrer.com/pen-plotting-experiments"/>; <作者>; <name>;adamfuhrer</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=adamfuhrer</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;< img src =“https://www.adamfuhrer.com/assets/images/main-gradient.jpg”样式=“宽度：220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;多伦多前端工程师。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-my-pen-plotting-journey" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36842182" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;死亡金属英语 (2013)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.invisibleoranges.com/death-metal-english/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T23:54:30.672139Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.invisibleoranges.com/ Death-metal-english/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;cdme</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=cdme</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.invisibleoranges.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/23/suffocation-thumb-e1383930752525-1052 x592.jpg" style="宽度: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;Vastum 的死亡金属英语歌词涉及色情和性，使用残酷和夸张的隐喻。死亡金属乐队使用死亡金属英语让他们的歌词听起来更残酷，并唤起邪恶感。死亡金属英语的特点是使用大词、形容词、介词短语、进行时、被动语态、古老或伪圣经的措辞、夸张的隐喻和不合逻辑或无意义的句子。它可以应用于任何主题，将普通的短语变成病态的死亡金属歌曲。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#death-metal-english-2013" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36821808" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry >; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;IBM 大型机：它如何运行以及为何生存</stitle>; <id>;https://arstechnica.com/information-technology/2023/07/the-ibm-mainframe-how-it-runs-and-why-it-survives/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T11:54： 30.673285Z</updated>; <link href="https://arstechnica.com/information-technology/2023/07/the-ibm-mainframe-how-it-runs-and-why-it-survives/"/>; <author>; <name>;rbc</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rbc</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cd n.arstechnica.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/new_IBM_z16-800x452.webp" style="width: 220px; height: 125px;" />;<br />;大型机至今仍然具有重要意义，估计有 10,000 台在使用中。它们被世界上最大的公司使用，其中大部分来自 IBM。大型机旨在处理大量数据工作负载并提供高可靠性。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-ibm-mainframe-how-it-runs-and-why-it-survives" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36846195" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;以色列议会通过法律限制司法权</stitle>; <id>;https://www.nytimes.com/live/2023/ 07/24/world/israel-protests-vote</id>; <更新>;2023-07-24T13:25:30.674348Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.nytimes.com/live/2023/07/24/world/israel-protests-vote"/>; <作者>; <name>;asimpletune</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=asimpletune</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static01.nyt.com/images/2018/10/15/multimedia/author-patrick-kingsley/author-patrick-kingsley-thumbLarge.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;以色列议会通过了一项法律，限制最高法院推翻政府决定的能力，完成了遏制司法影响力的更广泛努力的第一阶段。该法律遭到了反对和批评，因为许多人担心它会破坏以色列的民主。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#israeli-parliament-passes-law-to-limit-judial-power" target="_blank">;[sum mary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36847600" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;HP 45（以及 35 和 80）计算器模拟器</stitle>; <id>;https://sarahkmarr.com /retrohp1973.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-24T03:54:30.677229Z</更新>; <link href="https://sarahkmarr.com/retrohp1973.html"/>; <作者>; <name>;linsomniac</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=linsomniac</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;< img src="https://sarahkmarr.com/hp1973Window.jpg" style="宽度：220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;HP-1973 是一个基于 Python 的计算器模拟器，可以运行 HP-45、HP-35 和 HP-80 计算器的 ROM 代码。它提供带有各种自定义选项的 GUI 界面，并提供有关计算器内部工作原理的详细帮助。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hp-45-and-35-and-80-calculator-emulator" target="_blank ">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36842839" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;教你的法学硕士用事实而非虚构来回答</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.myscale.com/2023 /07/17/teach-your-llm-vector-sql/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-23T22:54:30.678608Z</更新>; <link href="https://blog.myscale.com/2023/07/17/teach-your-llm-vector-sql/"/>; <作者>; <name>;jinqueeny</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=jinqueeny</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blog.myscale.com/assets/img/chatgpt-hallucination-response.435cec3e.png" style="width: 220px; height: 122px;" />;<br />;大型语言模型 (LLM) 是先进的人工智能系统，可以回答各种问题。但是，它们可能会对不熟悉的主题提供不准确的响应，这称为幻觉。为了提高 LLM 的准确性，在查询中添加事实和支持文档非常重要。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#teach-your-llm-to-answer-with-facts- not-fiction" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36840728" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;年轻人涌向占星术</stitle>; <id>;https://www. Washingtonpost.com/lifestyle/2023/06/13/astrology-millennials-gen-z-science/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T22:54:30.680524Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.washingtonpost.com/lifestyle/2023/06/13/astrology-millennials-gen-z-science/"/>; <作者>; <name>;bookofjo e</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bookofjoe</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.washingtonpost.com/wp-apps/imrs.php?src=https://s3.amazonaws.com/arc-authors/washpost/746a8401-ccc8-492d-986e-b24f6863 9b61.png&w=196&h=196" style="宽度:220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;占星学领域在年轻一代的推动下正在蓬勃发展，到 2021 年估值将达到 128 亿美元。许多人转向占星学寻求自我完善和个人成长。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#young-people-are-flocking-to-astrology" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.y Combinator.com/item?id=36840674" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Llama2.c：在一个纯 C 文件中推理 llama 2</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/karpathy/llama2.c</id>; <updated>;2 023-07-23T18：54：30.681434Z </更新>; <link href="https://github.com/karpathy/llama2.c"/>; <作者>; <name>;anjneymidha</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=anjneymidha</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/karpathy/ llama2.c/master/assets/llama_cute.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;使用此代码，您可以在 PyTorch 中从头开始训练 Llama 2 LLM 架构，将权重保存到原始二进制文件，并将其加载到 C 文件中进行推理。C 文件可以通过简单的方法以交互速率运行合理大小的模型。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#llama2-c-inference-llama-2-in-one-file-of-pure-c " target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36838051" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;使用 DEA 制定的美国参议院法案目标端到端加密</stitle>; <id>;https://the record.media/senate-dea-bill-targets-end-to-end-encryption-requires-companies-to-report-drugs</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T00:54:30.682887Z</updated>; <link href="https://therecord.media/senate-dea-bill-targets-end-to-end-encryption-requires-companies-to-report-d rugs"/>; <作者>; <名称>;walterbell</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=walterbell</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cms.therecord.media/uploads/Suzanne_Smalley_27e80bc465.png?w=3840" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;一项要求社交媒体公司、加密通信提供商和其他在线服务向美国缉毒局 (DEA) 报告其平台上的毒品活动的法案已提交参议院。该法案引起了隐私倡导者的担忧，他们认为该法案将公司变成了事实上的缉毒机构，并威胁到端到端加密。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#us-senate-bill-crafted-with-dea-targets -end-to-end-encryption" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36841369" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;对 IE 时代消逝的思考</ stitle>; <id>;https://medium.com/@socrateslee/thoughts-on-the-fading-away-of-the-age-of-ie-a57cc5c165fc</id>; <更新>;2023-07-24T06:54:30.684009Z</更新>; <link href="https://medium.com/@socrateslee/thoughts-on-the-fading-away- of-the-age-of-ie-a57cc5c165fc"/>; <author>; <name>;socrateslee</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=socrateslee</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit:1358/1*yuVzMhCJyDENbyhwAsrkwA .png"样式="宽度：220px； height: 166px;" />;<br />;如今，几乎所有地方都不需要让网页/应用程序兼容 IE 浏览器。IE 不符合 W3C 标准，且难以调试。IE 的市场份额因软件更新机制而具有弹性。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#thoughts-on-the-fading-away-of-the-age-of-ie" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36822712" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;问 HN：最近哪篇研究论文让你大吃一惊？</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=3684 6965</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T12:54:30.685023Z</updated>; <link href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36846965"/>; <author>; <name>;froster</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=froster</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;研究人员购买了警方从拍卖网站查获了一批手机，发现其中约 25% 的手机可以轻易解锁，并且仍然保存有嫌疑人和受害者的敏感数据。根据已灭绝的古代大麻野生型的原始位置的分布情况，从籼稻和籼稻转向喜马拉雅大麻和籼稻大麻。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ask-hn-which-recently-research-paper-blow-your-mind" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36846965" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;李小龙和我</stitle>; <id>;https://kareem.substack.com/p/bruce-lee-and-me</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T05:54:30.687277Z</updated>; <link href="https://kareem.substack.com/p/bruce-lee-and-me"/>; <author>; <name>;yla9 2</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=yla92</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_120,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimage s%2F2f19825b-4e4c-4b40-a089-f0848ed5362a_1080x1080.jpeg" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;五十年前，卡里姆·阿卜杜勒·贾巴尔得知李小龙去世的消息，这对他打击很大，因为李小龙不仅是他的武术老师，也是他的亲密朋友。阿卜杜勒-贾巴尔描述了他多年来所经历的巨大损失，并反思了如果李小龙没有在 32 岁时去世，他会如何生活。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#bruce-lee-and-me" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36843514" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>; </content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;询问 HN：寻找用于语音控制操作的 Firefox 兼容扩展</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36844415</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T08:54:30.688189Z</updated >; <link href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36844415"/>; <author>; <name>;bryanrasmussen</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bryanrasmussen</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;需要一个与 Firefox 兼容的扩展来进行语音控制操作。现有的选项还不够，需要一种高级语音命令语言。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ask-hn-looking-for-a-firefox-兼容-extension-for-voice-control-actions" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36844415" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;美国大学有看似勒索的动机</stitle>; <id>;https://www.economist.com/united-states/2023/07/23/american-universities-have-an-incentive-to-seem-extortionate</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T00:54:30.689 091Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.economist.com/united-states/2023/07/23/american-universities-have-an-incentive-to-seem-extortionate"/>; <作者>; <name>;martincmartin</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=martincmartin</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src=" https://www.economist.com/cdn-cgi/image/width=1424,quality=80,format=auto/content-assets/images/20230722_USP503.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;美国的大学费用通常被认为难以承担，但实际上，大多数本科学位都是负担得起的，而且在许多情况下，上大学越来越便宜。公立大学比私立大学便宜得多，而且美国大学提供大幅的学费折扣。获得四年制学位的其他途径，例如参加社区大学，也可以帮助省钱。尽管负担能力强，但美国仍存在一种大学负担能力危机的感觉，这可能是由国家层面的比较以及标价与净成本之间的差异造成的。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#american-universities-have-an-incentive-to-sem-extortionate" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36841556" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hacker news.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Nulls Nullified (2005)</stitle>; <id>;http://www.dbazine.com/ofinterest/oi-articles/pascal27/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T05:54:30.689985Z</updated>; <link href="http://www.dbazine.com/ofinterest/oi-articles/pas cal27/"/>; <author>; <name>;declanhaigh</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=declanhaigh</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;文章批评数据库从业者缺乏数据基础知识，以及行业出版物和学术界缺乏基础知识。它特别批评了 SQL 数据库中 NULL 的使用，认为 NULL 违反了关系模型并导致不正确的查询结果。该文章建议缺失或不适用的值应进行关联处理，而不使用 NULL。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#nulls-nullified-2005" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36825668" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;乐观、傲慢和战略失实陈述</stitle>; <id>;https://albertcory50.substack.com/p/optimism-hubris-and-strategic-misrepresentation</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T04:54:30.690959Z</updated>; <link href="https://albertcory50.substack.com/p/optimism-hubris-and-strat egic-misrepresentation"/>; <author>; <name>;AlbertCory</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=AlbertCory</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post- media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F5a8d3ec6-3b5c-43cc-9a58-ea15560c9dea_1920x700.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：81px；" />;<br />;IT 项目常常是灾难，预算超支和失败。这些问题并不是计算机项目所独有的，而是由人性和政治因素造成的。乐观、傲慢和战略误传是这些失败背后的一些原因。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#optimism-hubris-and-strategic-misrepresentation" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36843136" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Inkscape 1.3</stitle>; <id>;https://inkscape.org/news/2023/07/23/inkscape-launches-version-13-focus-organizing-work/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-24T06:54:30.691875Z</更新>; <link href="https://inkscape.org/news/2023/07 /23/inkscape-launches-version-13-focus-organizing-work/"/>; <author>; <name>;Reventlov</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Reventlov</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://media.inkscape.org/media/news/uploads/about-screen-contest-1-3-splash.png" style="width: 220px;高度：83px；” />;<br />;Inkscape 推出 1.3 版本，重点是高效组织工作 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#inkscape-1-3" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36843794" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
